title: New: flor – Unsaid
body:
This new jam from Oregon outfit **flor** may well be their best yet.

Nailing the summery, R&B inspired dream-pop previously seen from the likes of Panama Wedding and Passion Pit, Unsaid is their most romantic, dignified moment to date. With their online fan base growing rapidly with every track they release, you can expect them to make the transition to festival favourites within no time. Check it out below.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a selection of the current hottest tracks.
